note:
In the Fediverse, I share profound (or especially heinous) insights from two separate, yet equally important places: my head and my ass. These are their stories.

Mrs. She/her. GenXy beast. I watch a ton of TV and know all the lyrics to all the songs played on U.S. radio in the 1980s. I like people who like to laugh. Header (by RiotGrlErin) has an outer-space background. I am fair skinned with cat-eye glasses. In my profile pic my eyes are stoned shut.
